Software Engineering Intern, Summer 2025
Google

Mountain View, CA, USA
Internship
Hybrid

Salary: $55 - $65 per hour

About the job
Join Google as a Software Engineering Intern for Summer 2025! You'll work on cutting-edge technology alongside world-class engineers.

Minimum qualifications
Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's or Master's degree program in Computer Science or related field
Expected graduation between December 2025 and June 2027
Experience with one or more programming languages (Python, Java, C++, Go)

Preferred qualifications
Returning to a degree program after the internship
Experience with data structures and algorithms
Strong problem-solving skills

Application deadline: January 15, 2025

Apply Now
